title: Can I have two servers on one laptop?
body:
I want to play on both NA and Oceania, so i downloaded the Oceania server. Is it going to mess up my original NA server?
Right now i have two league icons on my desktop and they both look the same...

replies.body: You can choose your region when you launch the patcher. Sometimes there will be small differences in the patch lines each region is using, so you may have a small patch each time you switch. I switch between NA and OCE pretty regularly.

You don't need 2 launcher icons as well.

You just need one and you can chance your sever from that.

They would look the same, the game logo doesn't change depending on the server you know :P

If they are both installed in to different locations then there wont be an issue aslong as you dont try to run both at the same time :P
